sense.def:
A direction
je splošna smer, v katero se nekdo ali nekaj giblje ali kaže nanjo.

seg.quote: We ended up going in the opposite direction from them.

sense.def:
Directions
so smernice, ki nam povedo, kaj naj storimo ali kako pridemo do nekega kraja.

seg.quote: Follow the directions that your doctor gives you.
I asked a policeman for directions to the hospital.

sense.def:
Če nekaj storimo
under someone else's direction
, nam nekdo pove, kaj moramo storiti.
